item.title: The case for divestment at Imperial
item.author: Felix Editor,Sarah Barfield Marks,
item.description: Here at Imperial, any mention of divestment from fossil fuels is largely met with one of two responses. The first is a supportive but disheartened reply along the lines of, “yeah, it’s a nice idea but it will never happen”. The second offers a complete aversion to the subject entirely, by changing …
